html:
before the child shall know. The prophecy explains that before the child is able to make his own moral choices, or arrives at the age of accountability, which is eight years old (D&C 68:25), the kingdoms of Syria and Israel (Northern Kingdom) will be laid waste. This prophecy was fulfilled within a few years, while Maher- shalal-hash-baz was still under the age of eight, when both Syria and Israel fell to Assyria.

both her kings. The kings of Syria and the Northern Kingdom of Israel.
